(a) show that t = mg(3cosș + 2)(7) at the instant when the particle reaches the point b, the string becomes slack. (a) show that ao = 2.7 m.(4) the particle p now receives an impulse acting in the direction ob and moves away from o towards b.  in the subsequent motion p does not reach b. (b) show that p moves with simple harmonic motion about centre o.(5) the mass of p is 10 kg and the magnitude of the impulse is j ns. given that p first comes to instantaneous rest at the point c where ac = 2.9 m, (c) (i) find the value of j,  (ii) find the time taken by p to travel a total distance of 0.5 m from when it first leaves o.(8)
